mapper.select: SELECT board2_no, board2_title, board2_content, board2_regdate, board2_isshow, member_id, member_name, member_class FROM board2 WHERE board2_isshow='Y' ORDER BY board2_no DESC
SELECT board2_no, board2_title, board2_content, board2_regdate, board2_isshow, member_id FROM board2 WHERE board2_isshow='Y' ORDER BY board2_no DESC LIMIT 5;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board2(board2_title, board2_content, board2_regdate, board2_isshow, member_id, member_name, member_class) values(#{board2_title},#{board2_content},now(),'Y',#{member_id},#{member_name},#{member_class})
